Keep your toddler entertained: Help your baby develop an interest in sports from an early age. While in the tub, encourage him or her to score the ball in the hoop. Congratulate him every time he does it, and he will improve his motor skills, coordination, and precision in no time. Keep your toddler entertained with these toddler sports toys for boys and girls.

Fun toddler bath toys for boys and girls: Looking at bath toys for toddlers or toddler gifts? Our baby basketball hoop is exactly what you are looking for. The bathtub basketball hoop is dedicated designed for little kids, boys or girls who enjoy playing time and super-fun activities. Make bath time fun and enjoyable.

Bathtime toys activity: We created this bath toy for kids having in mind children from 3 years old, but you are never too old to play a basketball shooting game or to score a slam dunk. The bath basketball hoop offers endless possibilities to have fun with this game set. Use these bathtub toys for toddlers to play with your family and spend quality time together.

Fun & durable: Our baby bathtub toys are made from high quality materials. This baby basketball hoop set comes with 4 soft basketball balls, 1 easy to use basketball hoop, 1 little mash bag, 1 air pump for the toy balls. We pride ourselves with excellent customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Looking at bath toys for toddlers or toddler gifts? Our bath basketball hoop is exactly what you are looking for. The bathtub basketball hoop is dedicated and designed for little kids, boys, or girls who enjoy playing time and super-fun activities. Make bath time fun and enjoyable.

ENCOURAGE THE LITTLE ONE While the little one is in the tub, encourage him to score the ball in the circle. Praise him every time he does it and he'll improve his motor skills, coordination, and accuracy in no time. FUN IN THE TUB Bath Basketball Hoop attracts the child's attention, and you can play together. After scoring several times or while playing, the mother can wash the baby's head. This bath basket can be used anywhere. Inside or outside. The possibilities are endless SCORE MORE AND MORE Now, the child has the opportunity to concentrate and have fun during the bath. From one day to the next, they will improve their scoring performance, and the soft balls offer a pleasant sensation to the touch.

PERFECT SIZE FOR TODDLERS The dimensions of 5.5 in x 5.5 in x 2 in, are perfect for a small child. Attach the bathroom basketball hoop to the tile or any smooth surface and the fun can begin 4 BALLS (SOFT) AND PUMP The Marppy bath basketball toy set includes 4 soft balls that are a pleasure to play with. The balls can be inflated and are perfect for small children's hands. Also, the balls are waterproof and thus water cannot get inside MESH BAG INCLUDED FOR STORAGE AND QUICK DRYING The mesh bag will help you store the toys and keep them in a safe place, ready for the next bath. Also, the bath toys will dry quickly and will always remain clean for your little one. SMOOTH EDGE AND 2 STRONG SUCTION CUP The edges are smooth and the two suction cups make the basket easy to install on any smooth surface and ready to use at any time PERFECT SIZE SOFT BALLS MESH BAG SMOOTH EDGE
Bath Basketball Hoop with 4 Soft Balls Bath Basketball Hoop with 4 Soft Balls Bath Basketball Hoop with 3 Balls Balls 4 inflatable balls 4 inflatable balls 3 non - inflating balls Storage Toy ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive and does the job, great suction cups
reviews.reviewText: This toy is perfect for both boys and girls, and it comes with a set of 4 soft balls. The best part is that it's super easy to set up with its strong suction cup. All you have to do is attach it to the side of the bathtub, and voila, you have an instant basketball hoop for some bath time fun.My little one absolutely loves playing with this toy. It keeps them entertained and engaged during bath time, and it's a great way to develop their hand-eye coordination. Plus, it adds an extra element of excitement and playfulness to their bath routine.The suction cup is really strong, so you don't have to worry about it falling off during play. And the soft balls are perfect for little hands, making it safe and enjoyable for toddlers.Cleaning up after playtime is a breeze too. The basketball hoop is made of durable materials that are easy to wipe clean, ensuring a hygienic environment for your little one.*Easy storage space , value for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome toy, small balls
reviews.reviewText: The suction cups on this hoop are amazingly strong but still easy to unsuck to move. I wish the hoop and the balls were both a little bigger, but for the price you really can't go wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute toy for boys
reviews.reviewText: the suction cups came a little messed up, but it still sticks to the side of the bath pretty nice, but my son is able to rip it off . he still plays with it and overall its cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great bath toy for little ones and toddlers. Easy to connect to the side of the bath. Even us parents enjoy shooting the balls with them. Family fun

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok for the price
reviews.reviewText: It comes with a hoop, four deflated balls, and the cheapest little pump you can imagine. The pump snapped immediately. Luckily I had a ball pump for other balls that worked. One ball has a slow leak. But the three remaining balls are great. Hoop suctions strong to the tub. Overall it's ok for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this and the pump would not inflate the balls. Customer service responded to me within a day and sent me an entire new product within three days. All after the busy Christmas season. Second set worked perfectly. Highly recommend for anyone needing an easy bath toy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My baby cousin loved throwing the balls, didn’t try to hard to make it in the goal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Grandkids love. Nice storage bag. Bought a second for another grandchild.
